scripts.deploy: cp /Users/mihai-edi/Projects/TabLift/Updates/appcast.xml build/ && touch build/.nojekyll && echo 'tablift.dev' > build/CNAME && cp /Users/mihai-edi/Projects/TabLift/Updates/sitemap.xml build/ && curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/turtle-key/TabLift/gh-pages/CHANGELOG.md  > build/CHANGELOG.md  && curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/turtle-key/TabLift/gh-pages/CHANGELOG.html  > build/CHANGELOG.html && gh-pages -d build --dotfiles
